name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: I bought one size smaller as was recommended in the comments and it is a perfect fit. Good quality tee shirt. I will definitely buy more. I’m normally a medium and I bought small.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: They claim it’s all cotton but it’s 60:40 cotton/polyester.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: The CARHARTT ‘K87’ Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt boasts commendable fabric quality and seems built to last. It’s evident that a lot of thought has gone into its construction. However, a word of caution for my fellow buyers: the sizing tends to run larger than typical standards here. Based on my experience, I’d suggest ordering one size down to ensure a more accurate fit. While the shirt is great, the sizing issue led me to give it a three-star rating.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: I don't know what sizing they are basing it off - probably some American chart but a small is still oversize for me (I'm normally a medium). At least I can pose as a dripster while looking at the WIP version for 3x the price.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo consiglio di prendere almeno una taglia in meno

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: I bought the relaxed fit and don’t know why people are saying it’s oversized. Fits pretty true to size for me. It’s definitely lengthier than normal but chest and sleeves are true to size. I also have other shirts that are more heavyweight than this. I’d say this fits more in the medium weight cotton and the price is about right for it. A proper heavyweight shirt will cost more.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: It is a good quality  Tshirt but it doesnt fit well i use to use one medium in most of the Tshirts and i bought in S and looks like an L
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 April 2019

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: My husband loves his new Carhartt pocket t-shirt. Great fit and feel.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Good quality highly recommend
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 November 2019

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Taille tres large, commandé en s pour 170 cm et 67 kg  c est vraiment trop large

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Muy buena calidad

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: This is a great shirt and it fits well. I would definitely buy again.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 July 2023

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Mein Mann ist komplett auf diese Shirts von Carhartt umgestiegen Gute Qualität und Passform auch für große Menschen.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Très bonne qualité, tissu épais. Mais taille très large.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Good quality, heavy weight tee. Sizes run quite large so definitely size down compared to most tees.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 August 2022

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Really nice shirt. Fairly heavy, quality fabric. Felt a little rough at first, but I washed cold & dried on low for 20 minutes and it’s much softer, I expect it will keep getting softer. And I don’t use any fabric softener other than white vinegar in the rinse cycle. Definitely a loose & long fit. I wear a size large in everything. 5’6” 160lbs. The color is very accurate to the photo in the listing, and very pretty.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 May 2023

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Wears ideally for work in progress. Loose enough to allow full movement and warm enough to keep you from freezing up.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 June 2023

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: De maat xl valt kleinerNormaal valt de kleding bij dit merk groter
date.of.review: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 2 February 2024

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Great quality material , i did get the next size down  to what i normally have and it fits great
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 June 2022

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Requested as a gift, very happy.  Comfort fit
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 March 2022

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Great work top
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2020

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Buen producto.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: I love these shirts so much, typical t-shirts are uncomfortable for a guy with a few extra pounds. These are roomy in all the right places and don't make you look like a complete slob.  Really solid material and comfortable for work and just running around. They have a perfect length too so you don't walk the line of looking like you're wearing a shirt dress, or so short your gut hangs out every time you reach up.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: The quality and the design are actually very good. But the sizing is just ridiculous! Ordered a small. More like an XXL!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 June 2019

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Son camisetas de máxima calidad con un gramaje espectacular.Si te gustan las camisetas de tela gorda y grandes....Las recomiendo!!!!!

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Leider ist die Produktangabe falsch. Das T-Shirt besteht zu 40% aus Polyester, nicht ausschließlich aus Baumwolle.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: As always, good quality and consistent fit.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 January 2024

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: T-shirt au top.Top qualitéTop colorisTop finitionBref du Carhartt, ceux qui connaissent comprendront, les autres découvriront.Juste attention à la taille. Cette pièce taille vraiment grande. Pris du S pour un M habituellement.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Sehr schönes Basicshirt für Männer, Größe ist passgenau, lässiger Fit, gute Länge (Köpergröße 1,85m). Preis Leistung tipptopp!

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: I recommend sizing down for this one if you like your t shirts a bit more fitted. Stick true to size if you really want it super relaxed and baggy. Still a fantastic T shirt and quality etc are all good.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 November 2023

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Bought as a gift.  Nice shade of light green.  Comfortable shirt with pocket (a must).  Nice weight -- not too light , not too heavy.  Would definitely buy this brand again.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Minst 1 större strl än carhartt whip,Men kvaliteten är mycket bättre än den europeiska varianten

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Bought the XXL firstly and it was huge. So opted for the xl and that was too small , maybe I’m the one that’s a strange shape or size but there’s a massive difference between the two sizes. It’s a good quality T-shirt but try before you buy
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 June 2022

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Baggy fit great quality
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 July 2021

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Nice thick material. But corse so if you have sensitive skin might irritate you but I like the material
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 October 2022

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Good thick quality material, colour match is perfect. Size was accurate, I’d purchase again
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 February 2024

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: El material se siente grueso y resistente y tiene muy buenas costuras, lo recomiendo totalmente, solo que viene algo larga y las tallas vienen amplias. Yo uso talla M y me pedí una S y me quedó excelente sólo que larga y la tuve que arreglar pero es muy buena playera.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Even though it's legit carhartt. You can easily tell that this one doesn't have the same fit or material as the previous one that i own (which was a bit more expensive).It's just heavier cotton and not as comfy as the other pocket tees. I've noticed you can tell the difference by looking at the neck tag/print.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Buen precio ,buena calidad,bien tallaje ,como todo lo carhartt la calidad es excelente,talla un poco ajustado,recomiendo coger una talla más de la que normalmente uses.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Excellent and fits perfect
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2024

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Spot on

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Que decir de Carhart, una calidad extraordinaria

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Tallan grandes pero sientan bien. Son muy bonitas, básicas. El color es muy agradable. El algodón es muy grueso y da muy buenas sensaciones, pero no da el resultado esperado después de muchos lavados.

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Really love these t-shirts! Very durable and loose fitting, which is good for not drawing attention to the bulge.Would definitely buy again
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 July 2020

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: My husband loves them. Got them in different colors. I highly recommend these. 👏

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: La t-shirt che ho indossato ha una qualità costruttiva soddisfacente. Il tessuto è leggero e confortevole sulla pelle, ideale per l'uso quotidiano. Le cuciture sono ben fatte, garantendo resistenza nel tempo. Nel complesso, una t-shirt che offre comfort e stile. Carhartt una garanzia

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: La calidad esperada de carhartt, un diseño atemporal y materiales duraderos, que más pedir a este precio…

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Good item with a deep pocket (which is why I wanted it), but it didn't smell too sweet on arrival and needed washing, whereupon a lot of dye came off (I'm glad I hand-washed it).Also, always order a size below what you would normally order as it's quite voluminous.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 November 2021

name: Carhartt Men's 'K87' Workwear Pocket Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: T shirt eccessivamente doppia  .. rifiniture nella media … difficoltà nella scelta tra le varie opzioni della taglia e della tipologia ..
